price: ¿Quién le dará a Dios un préstamo generoso, para que Él se lo multiplique y lo recompense ampliamente?
arabic: مَّن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يُقۡرِضُ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗا فَيُضَٰعِفَهُۥ لَهُۥ وَلَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٞ كَرِيمٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: man dhā alladhī yuq'riḍu al-laha qarḍan ḥasanan fayuḍāʿifahu lahu walahu ajrun karīmun
